title: Healing in Community After Harvey at Rothko Chapel
address: 1409 Sul Ross St Houston, TX 77006 United States
body: The Rothko Chapel opens its doors and holds space every Wednesday through the end of October to be in community with one another as Houston recovers from the tragedy and trauma experienced from Hurricane Harvey. Admission: Free.

title: Nature Story Time at Nature Discovery Center
address: 7112 Newcastle St Houston, TX 77401 United States
body: Bring the family to enjoy an interactive story time about animals and nature at Nature Discovery Center. This event is for pre-schoolers. Admission: Free.

title: The Office Trivia Night at Under the Radar
address: 1506 Truxillo St Houston, TX 77004 United States
body: From Micheal Scott to Dwight and from Pam to Jim, test your knowledge of the beloved comedy show, The Office at Under the Radar. Admission: Free.

title: Theater District Houston presents Houston Strong: A Theater District Benefit Honoring Local Heroes
address: 6000 Hermann Park Drive Houston, TX 77030 United States
body: The free benefit includes performances by seven of the Theater District’s resident companies — Alley Theatre, Da Camera of Houston, Houston Ballet, Houston Grand Opera, Houston Symphony, Society for the Performing Arts, and Theatre Under The Stars. Admission: Free.

title: Nina Diaz in Concert at The Continental Club
address: 3700 Main St Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: See the Girl in a Coma frontwoman, Nina Diaz, as she hits the stage at The Continental Club with openers Thee Commons. Admission: $12.

title: Ms. Lauryn Hill & Nas in Concert at Smart Financial Centre
address: 18111 Lexington Boulevard Sugar Land, TX 77479 United States
body: Grammy Award-winning powerhouse Ms. Lauryn Hill and anthemic rap superstar Nas co-headline a tour together and stop by the Smart Financial Centre in Sugar Land. Chronixx and Nick Grant open the show. Admission Tickets start at $41.50.

title: Umbria at The Sugarland Auditorium
address: 226 Lakeview Dr. Sugar Land, TX 77478 United States
body: Umbria in Sugar Land will be a multi-day Italian film festival throughout the city featuring Italian films from the Festival del Cinema Città di Spello ed i Borghi Umbri. The event will also include regional food, wine, and crafts from Umbria. Admission: $10.

title: Houston Dynamo vs. LA Galaxy at BBVA Compass Stadium
address: 2200 Texas Ave Houston, TX 77003 United States
body: Cheer on the Dynamo as they play against the LA Galaxy at BBVA Compass Stadium. Admission Tickets start at $25.

title: Adam Bricks in Concert at Raven Tower
address: 310 North St Houston, TX 77009 United States
body: Catch a free outdoor performance of the local singer-songwriter, Adam Bricks at Raven Tower. Admission Free.

title: Describe the Night at the University of Houston Quintero Theatre
body: Check out the world premiere of Describe the Night, a play that tells the story of men and women, spies, conspiracy theories, and the ever onward passage of time. Admission Tickets are $65.

title: Award Winning Karaoke at Guava Lamp
address: 570 Waugh Dr Houston , TX 77019 United States
body: Sing until your heart's content when the modern LGBT venue and bar, Guava Lamp, hosts a night of karaoke and drink specials. Sign up for karaoke begins at 9pm and karaoke begins at 10pm. Admission: Free.

title: Karaoke Night at The Secret Group
address: 2101 Polk Street Houston, TX 77003 United States
body: Sing your heart out at this weekly Karaoke Night at The Secret Group. Admission: Free.
